revised_title: Gas Turbine Requirements and Design Features
tldr: This article discusses the design and requirements of gas turbines, focusing on the versatility of the gas turbine and the variations that can be introduced into the simple cycle to enhance its performance for specific applications. The importance of pressure ratio and turbine entry temperature is emphasized, as well as the design features of the main components, such as compressors and turbines. The article also highlights the potential of closed-cycle gas turbines for nuclear power plants.
